title._content: Damas Veracruzanas. Salida del Gral Diaz

description._content: Title: Damas Veracruzanas. Salida del Gral Diaz Creator: Alba Date: 1911 Part Of: Manning Texas and Mexico collection Description: Women with flowers at the port of Veracruz before President Porfirio Diaz departs for exile to France May 31, 1911. Physical Description: 1 photographic print (postcard): gelatin silver Form/Genre: Photographs; Photographic prints; Postcards; Photographic postcards File: ag1981_0004_056c_damasveracruzanas_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu. For more information, see: digitalcollections.smu.edu/u?/mex,592 View Mexico: Photographs, Manuscripts, and Imprints at: digitalcollections.smu.edu/all/cul/mex/
